title: 电影观后感 《熔炉》

content: LoveIt 主题，简洁优雅高效，聚焦博客本身
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客

content: 安装hugo https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases hugo version hugo v0.82.1-60618210+extended windows/amd64 BuildDate=2021-04-20T11:02:50Z VendorInfo=gohugoio
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客

content: 创建站点并选择主题 本人选择的是LoveIt主题 cd E:\project hugo new site blog cd blog git init git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git cp themes/LoveIt/exampleSite/config.toml config.toml
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客

content: 添加帖子 cd blog hugo new posts/Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客.md 编辑帖子 --- Categories: ["hugo"] Tags: ["hugo", "Github Pages"] date: 2021-04-25T09:43:24+08:00 title: "Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客" featuredImage: "/images/hugo.png" draft: false --- LoveIt 主题，简洁优雅高效，聚焦博客编写 <!--more--> ...内容
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客

content: 修改配置本地启动 vim config.tomal hugo serve -e production --watch --port=1313 --bind=0.0.0.0 --theme= http://localhost:1313查看效果
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客

content: 发布到github 新建仓库 https://github.com/li2251421/li2251421.github.io 设置发布目录为docs(publishDir = “docs”) hugo命令生成网页 push 到 github 设置github pages，目录选择docs，绑定域名blog.kepreal.com
title: Hugo + Github Pages 搭建个人博客
